welcome.name: Welcome

params.name: token
params.description: The token of the bot

params.name: options
params.description: Yuko client options

params.name: options.allowedMentions
params.description: A list of mentions to allow by default when creating/editing messages

params.name: options.allowedMentions.roles
params.description: Whether to allow mention roles or not

params.name: options.allowedMentions.users
params.description: Whether to allow mentions users or not

params.name: options.autoReconnect
params.description: Whether to allow Yuko to auto reconnect

params.name: options.imageFormat
params.description: The default image format for avatars/icons. Default is "png"

params.name: options.imageSize
params.description: The default image size for avatars/icons. Default is 128

params.name: options.intents
params.description: The intents applied

params.name: options.messageCacheLimit
params.description: The total message limit to cache

params.name: options.shardCount
params.description: The total shards count for the bot to run

params.description: The reason which will be displayed in the audit log

methods.name: connect
methods.description: Connect the bot to Discord gateway

params.name: guildID
params.description: The ID of the guild

params.name: options
params.description: The role options

params.name: options.color
params.description: The color of the role. Must be in hex code form (eg. 0x7289DA)

params.name: options.hoist
params.description: Whether the role should be hoisted or not

params.name: options.icon
params.description: The role's image icon. Icon image must be as base64 data URI

params.name: options.mentionable
params.description: Whether the role is mentionable or not

params.name: options.name
params.description: The name of the role

params.name: options.unicodeEmoji
params.description: The emoji of the role

params.name: options.permissions
params.description: The permissions granted to the role

params.name: options.reason
params.description: The reason which will be displayed in the audit log

params.name: channelID
params.description: The ID of the channel

params.name: options
params.description: The message options

params.name: options.content
params.description: The message options

params.name: options.embed
params.description: An embed objects. Use `options.embeds` to send multiple embeds

params.name: options.embeds
params.description: An array of embed objects

params.name: options.messageReference
params.description: The message reference used when replying to messages

params.name: options.messageReference.channelID
params.description: The ID of the channel where the message was referenced

params.name: options.messageReference.failIfNotExists
params.description: Whether to throw an error when the message reference doesn't exist

params.name: options.messageReference.guildID
params.description: The ID of the guild where the message was referenced

params.name: options.messageReference.messageID
params.description: The ID of the message which was referenced

params.name: options.tts
params.description: Whether to send message as Text-to-Speech (TTS)

params.name: options
params.description: The options properties

params.name: options.afkChannelID
params.description: The ID of the AFK channel

params.name: options.afkTimeout
params.description: The timeout of AFK in voice channels (in seconds)

params.name: options.banner
params.description: The banner of the guild. Banner image must be as base64 data URI

params.name: options.defaultMessageNotifications
params.description: The default message notifications of the guild

params.name: options.description
params.description: The description of the guild

params.name: options.discoverySplash
params.description: The discovery splash of the guild. Discoery splash image must be as base 64 URI

params.name: options.explicitContentFilter
params.description: The explicit content filter level of the guild

params.name: options.features
params.description: The enabled features of the guild

params.name: options.icon
params.description: The icon of the guild. Icon image must be as base64 data URI

params.name: options.name
params.description: The name of the guild

params.name: options.ownerID
params.description: The ID of the owner which wil be transferred to

params.name: options.preferredLocale
params.description: The preferred guild language

params.name: options.publicUpdatesChannelID
params.description: The ID of the channel where guild admins will receive Discord notifications

params.name: options.reason
params.description: The reason which will be displayed in the audit log

params.name: options.rulesChannelID
params.description: The ID of the rule channel

params.name: options.splash
params.description: The splash of the guild. Splash image must be as base64 data URI

params.name: options.systemChannelFlags
params.description: The flags for the system channel

params.name: options.systemChannelID
params.description: The ID of the system channel

params.name: options.verificationLevel
params.description: The verification level

classes.name: Collection
classes.description: Represents a collection of a base object

params.name: obj
params.description: The object data

params.name: obj.id
params.description: The ID of the object

params.name: extra
params.description: An extra parameter the constructor may need

params.name: replace
params.description: Whether to replace an existing object with the same ID

methods.name: every
methods.description: Returns true if all elements satisfy the condition

params.name: func
params.description: A function that takes an object and returns true or false

methods.name: filter
methods.description: Return all the objects that make the function evaluate true

params.name: func
params.description: A function that takes an object and returns true if it matches

methods.name: find
methods.description: Return the first object to make the function evaluate true

params.name: func
params.description: A function that takes an object and returns true if it matches

methods.name: map
methods.description: Return an array with the results of applying the given function to each element

params.name: func
params.description: A function that takes an object and returns something

methods.name: random
methods.description: Get a random object from the Collection

methods.name: reduce
methods.description: Returns a value resulting from applying a function to every element of the collection

params.name: func
params.description: A function that takes the previous value and the next item and returns a new value

params.name: initialValue
params.description: The initial value passed to the function

params.name: obj
params.description: The object

params.name: obj.id
params.description: The ID of the object

methods.name: some
methods.description: Returns true if at least one element satisfies the condition

params.name: func
params.description: A function that takes an object and returns true or false

params.name: obj
params.description: The updated object data

params.name: obj.id
params.description: The ID of the object

params.name: extra
params.description: An extra parameter the constructor may need

params.name: replace
params.description: Whether to replace an existing object with the same ID

classes.name: Queue
classes.description: A sequentializing utility class used to efficiently manage promises.

methods.name: shift
methods.description: Unlocks the queue for the next promise.

methods.name: wait
methods.description: Waits for the last promise to complete and queues a new one.
